i prefer winter.

My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.

content.text: Hello there. I'm a tour guide at the Grand Canyon. I love my job and enjoy talking about the geology of the area. What are your interests?
Greetings! I love to travel. I have visited many countries and my favorite was Thailand. I saw the floating markets and they were amazing. What is your favorite place that you have been to?
I have never been to Thailand but it sounds like a wonderful place. I have visited many places in the US but my favorite place is the Grand Canyon. It is absolutely breathtaking.
Have you ever been to Utah? I live there and my girlfriend lives in Salt Lake City.
No I have not been to Utah. I have heard it is beautiful. I would love to visit one day.
You should definitely visit. It is a beautiful state with lots to offer.
What is your favorite thing about Utah?
I love the mountains and the outdoors. There are so many things to do. I also love the people. They are very friendly and welcoming.
Those are all great reasons to visit Utah. I will have to put it on my list of places to visit.
I hope you do. I know you will enjoy it.
Thank you. I am sure I will.
